subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: It has been more than a quarter-century, or 26 years, since Bjorn Borg last played Wimbledon, and his mystique remains greater than for any other player.
snippet: It has been more than a quarter-century, or 26 years, since Bjorn Borg last played Wimbledon, and his mystique remains greater than for any other player.
